overview:
Geoffrey Hyatt is a Boston-based entrepreneur, best known for founding and running Contact Networks from concept through acquisition by Thomson Reuters.

Geoffrey previously founded and ran Strong Numbers, which was acquired and is now part of Intuit.

Previously, Geoffrey worked at Boston Consulting Group in Munich and Boston, and for the International Finance Corporation (World Bank).

degrees.institution: Kellogg Graduate School of Management, Northwestern University

milestones.description: Contact Networks acquired by Thomson Reuters
